data.name: AI:Skynet
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
[i] 'Remember the message... the future is not set. There is not fate but what we make for ourselves.' [/i]
The UEC has lost control of it's autonomous defence project. STANZA has corrupted the AI systems in control of island production and defence, now with access to near limitless computing power it is believed that the island defence AI system has formed a kind of distributed neural network.
We've lost contact with all work crews and computer assets except the Epsilon..
---
This mod makes the Red AI units more aggressive. When you get within visual range of an island, it's defences will spring into action, ships, ground units and aircraft will head for you intent on your destruction.
2024-12-22 - Skynet is now compatible with most mods (except any mod that edits library_custom_3.lua.
